content.html:
@Christian: your server is returning an HTTP 400 to the request made by the openid library.
It appears that Bad Behavior is catching the openid request as something bad. It appears that it doesn't like the range header, which is a bit odd... I'll see if I can do something about having Bad Behavior block those, but probably not sending a "range" header is probably a good idea. Meanwhile, I submitted a patch to the author of bad-behavior to allow php-openid clients to use range, as well. Ciao!
